title: Community Education for Girls
description: This project aims to provide educational resources, mentorship, and scholarships to girls in rural areas to support their educational journey.

tasks.title: Buy Textbooks
tasks.description: Purchase textbooks for students in different grades.

tasks.title: Provide Scholarships
tasks.description: Offer full scholarships for high-performing students.

tasks.title: Hire Teachers
tasks.description: Recruit and pay teachers for the education program.

tasks.title: Buy School Supplies
tasks.description: Provide essential school supplies for students.

tasks.title: Community Outreach
tasks.description: Create awareness and gather community support for the project.
